name: Pirate treasure
description:
Pirate Treasure - A logic puzzle game in which you have to hunt pirate treasures!

There are many different levels waiting for you in the game, so go through them all! Control the cannon on your ship and destroy enemy fortifications with precise shots at weak points! Do everything in your power to steal treasures.


Game Features:
- Many levels
- Convenient control
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
